sentences.sContent: Scholarships are given solely on the basis of financial need.
sentences.sCn: 奖学金完全是根据经济需要发放的。

sentences.sContent: I shall hold you solely responsible for anything that goes wrong.
sentences.sCn: 出现任何差错的话，我唯你是问。

sentences.sContent: ...Hunger isn't controlled solely by the physical characteristics of a recent meal...
...Some people have bought cars solely to rent them out...

trans.tranOther: not involving anything or anyone else
